statements: SELECT * FROM student_reports ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM student_reports WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT student_name, performance_score FROM student_reports WHERE progress_status = 'Good' ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, attendance_status FROM student_reports WHERE performance_score >= 80;
SELECT student_name, progress_status, performance_score FROM student_reports WHERE progress_status = 'Excellent' LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2;
SELECT student_id, student_name, performance_score FROM student_reports WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT student_name, progress_status FROM student_reports WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT * FROM student_reports ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM student_reports WHERE progress_status LIKE 'Completed%' AND performance_score BETWEEN 70 AND 90;
SELECT student_id, student_name, attendance_status FROM student_reports WHERE attendance_status = 'Absent' ORDER BY student_name DESC, student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_performance
SELECT student_id, performance_score, assessment_date, test_type FROM student_performance ORDER BY performance_score DESC
SELECT student_id, test_type, assessment_date, performance_score FROM student_performance WHERE performance_score > 80
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_status = TRUE ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT student_id, attendance_status, date FROM student_attendance
SELECT student_id, performance_score FROM student_performance WHERE performance_score >= 80
SELECT * FROM student_performance WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC
SELECT student_id, MAX(performance_score) AS max_score FROM student_performance GROUP BY student_id HAVING MAX(performance_score) > 90

SELECT sp.student_id, sp.performance_score, sa.attendance_status FROM student_performance sp INNER JOIN student_attendance sa ON sp.student_id = sa.student_id WHERE sa.attendance_status = TRUE AND sp.performance_score < 70
SELECT DISTINCT test_type FROM student_performance ORDER BY test_type DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM student_performance ORDER BY grade ASC;
SELECT student_id, grade, subject FROM student_performance WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT teacher, subject FROM student_performance WHERE subject = 'Math';
SELECT * FROM student_attendance ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT student_id, date, status FROM student_attendance WHERE status = 'Absent';
SELECT student_id, grade, subject FROM student_performance;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE status = 'Present';
SELECT subject, teacher, grade FROM student_performance ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_id, progress_notes, assessment_result FROM student_progress WHERE assessment_result = 'Pass';
SELECT * FROM student_attendance ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Student;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM Student WHERE age > 20;
SELECT student_id, email FROM Student WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT test_name, test_score FROM Performance WHERE test_score >= 90 ORDER BY test_score DESC;
SELECT progress_description, progress_date FROM Progress WHERE progress_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Student ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM Student WHERE age > 20 AND gender='Male';
SELECT student_id, email FROM Student WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT p.test_name, p.test_score, s.first_name, s.last_name FROM Performance p INNER JOIN Student s ON p.student_id = s.student_id WHERE p.test_score >= 80 ORDER BY p.test_score DESC;

SELECT pr.progress_description, pr.progress_date, s.first_name, s.last_name FROM Progress pr INNER JOIN Student s ON pr.student_id = s.student_id WHERE pr.progress_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY pr.progress_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Student;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Student ORDER BY student_grade DESC;
SELECT student_name, subject FROM Student JOIN Progress ON Student.student_id = Progress.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Progress WHERE progress_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM Reports WHERE report_type = 'mid-term';
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Student;
SELECT attendance_date, status FROM Attendance WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT subject, progress_status FROM Progress ORDER BY progress_status DESC;
SELECT report_type, report_details FROM Reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT class_name, class_schedule FROM VirtualClassroom WHERE class_id IN (1, 2, 3);
